entries.name: init
entries.summary: Initialize Steamworks.

entries.description: Call this from a script component.
entries.name: update
entries.summary: Update Steamworks.

entries.name: restart
entries.summary: Restart Steamworks.

entries.name: finalize
entries.summary: Finalize Steamworks.

entries.name: ELeaderboardDataRequestGlobal
entries.summary: Requests rows in the leaderboard from the full table

entries.name: ELeaderboardDataRequestGlobalAroundUser
entries.summary: Requests rows in the leaderboard from rows around the user

entries.name: ELeaderboardDataRequestFriends
entries.summary: Requests all the rows for friends of the current user

entries.name: ELeaderboardSortMethodAscending
entries.summary: Top-score is lowest number

entries.name: ELeaderboardSortMethodNone
entries.summary: Top-score is highest number

entries.name: ELeaderboardUploadScoreMethodKeepBest
entries.summary: Leaderboard will keep user's best score

entries.name: ELeaderboardUploadScoreMethodForceUpdate
entries.summary: Leaderboard will always replace score with specified

entries.name: ELeaderboardDisplayTypeNumeric
entries.summary: Simple numerical score

entries.name: ELeaderboardDisplayTypeTimeSeconds
entries.summary: The score represents a time, in seconds

entries.name: ELeaderboardDisplayTypeTimeMilliSeconds
entries.summary: The score represents a time, in milliseconds

entries.name: EOverlayToStoreFlag_None
entries.summary: Passed as parameter to the store

entries.name: EOverlayToStoreFlag_AddToCart
entries.summary: Passed as parameter to the store

entries.name: EOverlayToStoreFlag_AddToCartAndShow
entries.summary: Passed as parameter to the store

entries.name: EActivateGameOverlayToWebPageMode_Default
entries.summary: Passed as parameter to ActivateGameOverlayToWebPage

entries.name: EActivateGameOverlayToWebPageMode_Modal
entries.summary: Passed as parameter to ActivateGameOverlayToWebPage

entries.name: EPersonaStateOffline
entries.summary: Friend is not currently logged on

entries.name: EPersonaStateOnline
entries.summary: Friend is logged on

entries.name: EPersonaStateBusy
entries.summary: User is on, but busy

entries.name: EPersonaStateAway
entries.summary: Auto-away feature

entries.name: EPersonaStateSnooze
entries.summary: Auto-away for a long time

entries.name: EPersonaStateLookingToTrade
entries.summary: Online, trading

entries.name: EPersonaStateLookingToPlay
entries.summary: Online, wanting to play

entries.name: EPersonaStateInvisible
entries.summary: Online, but appears offline to friends.  This status is never published to clients.

entries.name: apps_is_dlc_installed
entries.summary: Takes AppID of DLC and checks if the user owns the DLC & if the DLC is installed.

entries.description: Same rules as GetFriendPersonaState() apply as to whether or not the user knowns the name of the other user note that on first joining a lobby, chat room or game server the local user will not known the name of the other users automatically; that information will arrive asyncronously.
entries.name: friends_get_friend_persona_name
entries.summary: Returns the name of another user.

entries.description: This is the same name as on the users community profile page. This is stored in UTF-8 format.
entries.name: friends_get_persona_name
entries.summary: Returns the local players name - guaranteed to not be NULL.

entries.name: friends_get_persona_state
entries.summary: Gets the status of the current user.

entries.description: This will only be known by the local user if steamIDFriend is in their friends list; on the same game server; in a chat room or lobby; or in a small group with the local user.
entries.name: friends_get_friend_persona_state
entries.summary: Returns the current status of the specified user.

entries.name: friends_get_friend_steam_level
entries.summary: Get friends steam level.

entries.name: friends_get_friend_relationship
entries.summary: Returns a relationship to a user.

entries.name: friends_activate_game_overlay_to_store
entries.summary: Activates game overlay to store page for app.

entries.description: Full address with protocol type is required, e.g. http://www.steamgames.com/
entries.name: friends_activate_game_overlay_to_web_page
entries.summary: Activates game overlay web browser directly to the specified URL.

files.file_summary: Interface to access information about individual users and interact with the

entries.name: set_listener
entries.summary: Set a listener.
entries.usage:
steam.set_listener(function(self, event, data)if event == "GameOverlayActivated_t" then
print("Overlay is active:", data.m_bActive)
end
end)

entries.description: A CSteamID is a unique identifier for an account, and used to differentiate users in all parts of the Steamworks API.
entries.name: user_get_steam_id
entries.summary: Returns the CSteamID of the account currently logged into the Steam client.

entries.name: user_get_player_steam_level
entries.summary: Gets the Steam Level of the user, as shown on their profile.

entries.description: If you only have one set of cards, the series will be 1. The user has can have two different badges for a series; the regular (max level 5) and the foil (max level 1).
entries.name: user_get_game_badge_level
entries.summary: Trading Card badges data access.

entries.name: user_logged_on
entries.summary: Returns true if the Steam client current has a live connection to the Steam

entries.description: Only valid once the user has connected to steam .
entries.name: user_is_behind_nat
entries.summary: Returns true if this users looks like they are behind a NAT device.

entries.name: user_is_phone_verified
entries.summary: Gets whether the users phone number is verified.

entries.name: user_is_phone_identifying
entries.summary: Gets whether the users phone number is identifying.

entries.name: user_is_phone_requiring_verification
entries.summary: Gets whether the users phone number is awaiting (re)verification.

entries.name: user_is_two_factor_enabled
entries.summary: Gets whether the user has two factor enabled on their account.

entries.name: user_get_auth_ticket_for_web_api
entries.summary: Retrieve a session ticket

entries.name: user_stats_get_stat_int

params.description: Id of the stat to get
params.name: id

entries.summary: Get user stat as an integer.

entries.name: user_stats_set_stat_int

params.description: Id of the stat to set
params.name: id

entries.summary: Set user stat.

entries.name: user_stats_get_stat_float

params.description: Id of the stat to get
params.name: id

entries.summary: Get user stat as a floating point number.

entries.name: user_stats_set_stat_float

params.description: Id of the stat to set
params.name: id

entries.summary: Set user stat.

entries.name: user_stats_request_current_stats
entries.summary: Ask the server to send down this user's data and achievements for this game.

entries.description: This call is asynchronous, with the results returned in GlobalStatsReceived_t. nHistoryDays specifies how many days of day-by-day history to retrieve in addition to the overall totals. The limit is 60.
entries.name: user_stats_request_global_stats
entries.summary: Requests global stats data, which is available for stats marked as "aggregated".

entries.description: Will get a callback when set and one callback for every new achievement  If the callback has a result of k_EResultInvalidParam, one or more stats uploaded has been rejected, either because they broke constraints or were out of date. In this case the server sends back updated values. The stats should be re-iterated to keep in sync.
entries.name: user_stats_store_stats
entries.summary: Store the current data on the server.

entries.name: user_stats_reset_all_stats

params.description: True if achievements should be reset as well.
params.name: achievements

entries.summary: Reset stats.

entries.name: user_stats_set_achievement
entries.summary: Set achievement.

entries.name: user_stats_get_achievement
entries.summary: Get achievement.

entries.name: user_stats_clear_achievement
entries.summary: Clear achievement.

entries.description: In general games should not need these functions because they should have a list of existing achievements compiled into them.
entries.name: user_stats_get_num_achievements
entries.summary: Used for iterating achievements.

entries.name: user_stats_get_achievement_name
entries.summary: Get achievement name iAchievement in [0,GetNumAchievements)

entries.description: Accepts the following keys * "name" and "desc" for retrieving the localized achievement name and description (returned in UTF8) * "hidden" for retrieving if an achievement is hidden (returns "0" when not hidden, "1" when hidden)
entries.name: user_stats_get_achievement_display_attribute
entries.summary: Get general attributes for an achievement.

entries.name: user_stats_get_achievement_achieved_percent
entries.summary: Returns the percentage of users who have achieved the specified achievement.

entries.description: This call is asynchronous, with the result returned in a listener callback with event set to LeaderboardFindResult_t.
entries.name: user_stats_find_or_create_leaderboard

params.description: The name of the leaderboard to find or create.
params.name: leaderboard_name

params.description: The sort order of the new leaderboard if it's created.
params.name: eLeaderboardSortMethod

params.description: The display type (used by the Steam Community web site) of the new leaderboard if it's created.
params.name: eLeaderboardDisplayType

entries.summary: Gets a leaderboard by name, it will create it if it's not yet created.

entries.name: user_stats_get_leaderboard_name
entries.summary: Get the name of a leaderboard.

entries.name: user_stats_get_leaderboard_entry_count
entries.summary: Get the total number of entries in a leaderboard, as of the last request.

entries.description: This call is asynchronous, with the result returned in a listener callback with event set to LeaderboardScoresDownloaded_t. LeaderboardScoresDownloaded_t will contain a handle to pull the results from GetDownloadedLeaderboardEntries(). You can ask for more entries than exist, and it will return as many as do exist. * k_ELeaderboardDataRequestGlobal requests rows in the leaderboard from the full table, with nRangeStart & nRangeEnd in the range [1, TotalEntries] * k_ELeaderboardDataRequestGlobalAroundUser requests rows around the current user, nRangeStart being negate e.g. DownloadLeaderboardEntries( hLeaderboard, k_ELeaderboardDataRequestGlobalAroundUser, -3, 3 ) will return 7 rows, 3 before the user, 3 after * k_ELeaderboardDataRequestFriends requests all the rows for friends of the current user
entries.name: user_stats_download_leaderboard_entries
entries.summary: Asks the Steam back-end for a set of rows in the leaderboard.

entries.name: user_stats_get_downloaded_leaderboard_entry
entries.summary: Returns data about a single leaderboard entry

entries.description: This call is asynchronous, with the result returned in a listener callback with event set to LeaderboardScoreUploaded_t.
entries.name: user_stats_upload_leaderboard_score
entries.summary: Uploads a user score to a specified leaderboard.

entries.summary: Returns the appID of the current process.

entries.name: utils_get_seconds_since_app_active
entries.summary: Return the number of seconds since the user.

entries.name: utils_is_steam_running_on_steam_deck
entries.summary: Returns true if currently running on the Steam Deck device.

returns.description: True if size of image was read successfully
returns.name: ok

entries.summary: Get size of image

entries.name: utils_get_image_rgba

returns.description: True if size of image was read successfully
returns.name: ok

entries.summary: Get image in RGBA format.

entries.name: utils_get_server_real_time
entries.summary: Returns the Steam server time in Unix epoch format. (Number of seconds since Jan 1, 1970 UTC)
